name: GetAvailableRefundPaymentMethodsForOrder
description:
Get all available options for refunds on the given order

Refunds can be executed with the CreateRefund service

properties.name: IsAutoRefundAvailable
properties.description: Indicates if this order can be (partially) refunded with RefundOrder.

properties.name: OrderAmountAvailableForRefund
properties.description: The amount currently available for refund on the given order
